_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: RoRNet 2.38
author: admin@rigsofrods.org
description: RoRNet 2.38 is for Rigs of Rods. It is compatible with 0.4.7.0 only clients.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# RoRNet 2.38 for Rigs of Rods 0.4.7.0 Installation Script

echo "RoRNet 2.38 for Rigs of Rods 0.4.7.0 Installation Script"

echo "RoR|installed required services."
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install zip unzip wget

mkdir -p /mnt/server && cd /mnt/server
echo "RoR|created directory for installation."

wget http://files.rigsofrods.org/rorserver-rornet238-linux.zip --no-check-certificate
echo "RoR|retrived files from server."

unzip rorserver-rornet238-linux.zip
rm -rf rorserver-rornet238-linux.zip
echo "RoR|unzipped files."

mv /mnt/server/rorserver-rornet238-linux/* /mnt/server/
rm -rf /mnt/server/rorserver-rornet238-linux
echo "RoR|cleaned up."

chmod +x rorserver
echo "RoR|permissions assigned."

variables.name: Max Players
variables.description: Amount of players that can connect.

variables.name: Terrain
variables.description: Default Terrain of the server. Changing to "any" allows the player to select.

variables.name: Name
variables.description: The server name that will be displayed to players.
